title: Online Intercultural Action Research Field Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental online communication abilities and general understanding of intercultural communication
context.additional_context: A language education program for working professionals. Real-time online sessions are conducted in a fully digital device-equipped environment, operating during evening hours to accommodate participants' work schedules.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and document global intercultural communication scenarios at least three times using online field investigation tools
Learners can design solutions for intercultural conflict cases according to action research methodology and incorporate peer assessment feedback
Learners can identify and explain at least five differences in non-verbal communication across cultures based on virtual field visit experiences

resources: Tablet with Real-Time Screen Sharing Capability

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
